snippet.title: Mr. Prospector - Horiate-kun (ミスタープロスペクターほりあてくん): 100% Playthrough (All Items Collected)
snippet.description:
The original recording of the video was 4 hours 16 minutes, but most of the segments are fast-forwarded due to the nature of the game that requires tons of repetitions of going through the same thing (mining). Basically the game revolves around stats / gear check in order to collect all items (and pray for good RNG as well).
